title: International Senior Finance and Operations Executive named Chief Financial Officer and Chief Operating Officer of Neon Bloom's wholly owned subsidiary Bazelet - GlobeNewswire
content: International Senior Finance and Operations Executive named Chief Financial Officer and Chief Operating Officer of Neon Bloom's wholly owned subsidiary Bazelet  GlobeNewswire
description: COLUMBIA, Md., April  21, 2022  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Neon Bloom Inc. (OTC: NBCO) - Bazelet Health Systems, Inc. (Bazelet™), a wholly owned subsidiary of...
